title: Zeppelin Products Inc. NCAA LSU Tigers Tip Leather Concho Belt
features: 4 Decorative silver gun metal concho logos with matching buckle keeper and tip
Great with dressy pants, slacks and jeans with 1.25 inch loops
description: Show off your LSU Tigers school and team spirit with this dressy leather belt. A subtle way to support your team while accessorizing any dress attire. This brown genuine oil-tanned leather belt features an ornate silver gun metal buckle, keeper, tip and tapered ends. Decorated with 4 silver gun metal conchos throughout the belt. Fits slacks that have a minimum loop size of 1.25 inches. Belt size is one size larger than pant size.
